entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY ENDED, Alliston

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries ending overnight then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 10:12 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late in the afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 10:12 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
